label: SustainabilityCharacteristic
comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified inspection result applicable to this sustainability characteristic.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A code specifying the content type of this product characteristic.
A code specifying a measurement method for this product characteristic.
The indication of whether or not this sample observation result characteristic is shareable.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
The subordinate category for this sustainability characteristic.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.
A value, expressed as a monetary value, for this document characteristic.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
A date, time, date time or other date time value for this document characteristic.
The value for this metric characteristic expressed as an indicator.
A value, expressed as a number, for this document characteristic.
A parameter specified for a value for this metric characteristic.
A range specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A sustainability characteristic related to this supply chain event.
